alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LEE COUNTY THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Three Oaks, or 9 miles southeast of Fort Myers, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, Lehigh Acres, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Pine Manor, Lovers Key State Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Iona, Cypress Lake, Buckingham, Villas, Three Oaks, East Dunbar, Whiskey Creek, Page Park, Page Field Airport, and Punta Rassa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
